detaileddescription.para: This functions handles the NFS4_OP_RENAME operation in NFSv4. This function can be called only from nfs4_Compound

parameterdescription.para: [INOUT] Pointer to the compound request's data

simplesect.para: NFS4_OK if successfull, other values show an error.

detaileddescription.para: nfs4_op_rename_Free: frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_rename.
Frees what was allocared to handle nfs4_op_rename.

briefdescription.para: Routines used for managing the NFS4 COMPOUND functions.
